::Rex::

Rex looks at Battera as she mentions loosening up, his eyes clouding over. 
"Most Maximals are cheery, yes. You should meet Firearm. He'd joke while 
being tortured."

He looks ahead at her, his eyes blank. "When I was first put online, I was in 
a Maximal colony. Shortly after, a Predacon group attacked us, destroying 
everyone I had ever known or cared for. I was the only survivor."

Rex pauses. He could still hear the screams and gunfire as Maximal after 
Maximal was tortured and brutally murdered. He had fallen into a ditch, a 
dead body of a Maximal covering him there during the attack.

"I enlisted in the Maximal army, and swore to avenge the death of my friends."

With that, he resumes walking, falling silent.
